Data Fields
device_transfer_t Struct Reference
Device Configuration

Data structure used for reads and writes of devices. More...

#include <device.h>

Collaboration diagram for device_transfer_t:

Detailed Description

This is the data structure for data transfers.

Data Fields

int tid
 The calling task ID.
 
int flags
 The flags for the open file descriptor.
 
int loc
 The location to read or write.
 
int nbyte
 The number of bytes to transfer.
 
hwpl_callback_t callback
 The function to call when the operation completes.
 
void * context
 The first argument to callback.
 
const void * cbuf
 Pointer to const void buffer.
 
void * buf
 Pointer to void buffer.
 
const char * cchbuf
 Pointer to const char buffer.
 
char * chbuf
 Pointer to char buffer.
